Wings made from her brother Monte‚Äôs used clothes are a symbol of the artist‚Äôs 20-year fight to keep her sibling free from incarceration and abuse. Bearing the weight of the wings, Cullors leads witnesses to an 8-foot nest which she adorns with Monte‚Äôs clothing. (6/8)

ùôãùôßùôñùôÆùôöùôß ùô©ùô§ ùô©ùôùùôö ùôÑùôÆùôñùô¢ùôû is a love letter to Los Angeles and, most importantly, a loving prayer for her brother, Monte. James Baldwin is heard speaking of the American Negro crisis, and Cullors reads the #YesOnR ballot measure she initiated to reform L.A. jails. (5/8)

Cullors is currently the Faculty Director at Arizona‚Äôs @Prescottcollege, where she designed a new Social and Environmental Arts Practice MFA program, which is focused on the intersection of art, social justice, and community organizing‚Äîthe first of its kind in the nation. (4/8)

#YesOnR obtains subpoena power for L.A.‚Äôs Sheriff Civilian Oversight Commission and researches community-based alternatives to L.A. County‚Äôs jail expansion plan. It successfully passed in March 2020. (3/8)
For 20 years, Cullors has been on the frontlines of criminal justice reform and is the founder/chair of a L.A. County ballot initiative, #YesOnR. (2/8)

Driskell‚Äôs intention was to break racial exclusion that existed in most mainstream art institutions. Driskell‚Äôs legacy is foundational to shows like #SoulofaNation, and we are grateful for his vital contributions to art.

A groundbreaking advocate for Black artists and art, Driskell guest curated Two Centuries of Black American Art at @LACMA in 1976, the only historically comprehensive exhibition of art by Black Americans ever to be presented by a major American art museum.
We remember Professor David C. Driskell, artist, teacher, and curator, who died on April 1 in the coronavirus pandemic.

‚ÄúThere was a need to acknowledge the presence of the African American experience in so many ways‚Äìbut also to validate it by doing the historical research to show the long history of Black artists working in America.‚Äù ‚ÄìDavid C. Driskell https://t.co/2ou6KdXPLQ
